quality_assessment: Comprehensive examples page with accurate, production-ready YAML configurations. Minor improvements possible for clarity and MkDocs Material visual features.

issues.description: Page lacks MkDocs Material visual enhancements that would improve readability and user experience
issues.fix_suggestion: Add admonitions (notes, tips, warnings), code block annotations, and tabbed content to enhance visual presentation

issues.section: Section 3: Environment Variables and Secrets Example
issues.description: The example references a non-existent file 'workflows/environment-example.yml'. The source reference is a conceptual example, not an actual workflow file in the repository.
issues.fix_suggestion: Either create the referenced workflow file or update the source reference to indicate this is a conceptual example

issues.description: The backoff strategy YAML syntax uses serde-style format which differs from actual implementation. The documented syntax shows nested fixed/linear/exponential keys but doesn't match the BackoffStrategy enum deserialization format exactly.
issues.should_be: The BackoffStrategy uses #[serde(rename_all = "snake_case")] but the delay Duration format needs humantime_serde or explicit Duration handling
issues.fix_suggestion: Verify the YAML syntax matches actual deserialization behavior. Consider adding a note about duration format requirements.

issues.description: Documentation shows 'do:' block syntax but the actual struct uses '#[serde(rename = "do")]' for the do_block field. The documentation is accurate but could clarify this mapping.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a note explaining that 'do:' in YAML maps to the internal 'do_block' field

issues.description: The timeout_config example shows undocumented fields like idle_timeout_secs that may not be fully implemented
issues.fix_suggestion: Verify these timeout_config fields are actually implemented in TimeoutConfig and document their behavior

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of all major configuration features
Real-world examples extracted from actual workflows in the repository
Accurate source code references with file paths and struct names
Clear annotations explaining configuration choices and their purposes
Well-organized quick reference table for comparing standard vs MapReduce workflows
Proper coverage of error handling, validation, and gap filling patterns
Accurate MapReduce configuration including phases, error policies, and merge workflows
Correct documentation of ValidationConfig fields and OnIncompleteConfig options
All internal cross-reference links are valid and point to existing pages
improvement_suggestions: Add admonitions (notes, tips, warnings) using MkDocs Material syntax to highlight important information
Use code block annotations to explain complex YAML configurations inline
Add tabbed content to show alternative syntax options (e.g., simplified vs nested agent_template)
Include visual icons for different configuration categories
Add a 'Common Pitfalls' section for each example type
Consider adding diagrams showing workflow execution flow
Add copy buttons to code blocks for easier use
Include validation examples showing expected output format

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
